title: "Update your Account" email
body: This is extremely annoying. Its not 'updating your account' at all. Its first in first served rename your account and lose your username because someone knew about it first. Suddenly the tag I've been using since i started gaming like 20 years ago is now someone elses. I don't want to lose my tag, I've been Tactictoe in every game I've ever played for as long as I can remember. Why do we have to do this?!

replies.body: So much for 'support' eh? Can't even answer one simple question.
but what happens if we don't do it???? I haven't read the email yet
